channel.title: Skill cape emotes
channel.description: okay so im trying to make some skill cape emotes you know if you click the button an wearing this skill cape then do this animations or w.e. heres the thing im having difficult with i cant seem to find the skillcape emotes or animations and gfx or watever so please if someone could give me a list or a link to were to find the scape emote/animation/gfx it would help alot!

item.title: Skill cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

i searched for the guid couldnt find it maybe a link will help? or am i suppose to search for that in my client? anyways in clicking most i found this.
case 74077:
// skill cape emote
c.sM(“Coming Soon”);
break;
so what i was thinking was
if(wearID == scape) {
c.setAnimation(ID);
c.setGfx(ID);
c.setEmote(ID);
}
and just like 20 of these one for each skill cape
but i need the ID’s

Read full topic

item.title: Skill cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’d be clickingmost, something like:

case (SkillcapeButtonID):

if (player.equip(ID) {
player.animation(#)
player.gfx(##)
} else if (player.equip(ID) {
player.animation(#)
player.gfx(##)

I know its incorrect methods, it was just a template of how it should be done. I’m just too lazy to search for the right method, and the ID would be each skillcape id,[/quote]
lol i already knew this. i needed the animation/gfx/emote IDs…

Read full topic

Not the server.

If not, go look for Lost Valention’s guide.[/quote]
i searched google for that guide didnt find anything to do with rsps
isnt it just like
if pres this button and is wearing ID
do this emote
this gfx
and this animation
}
thats kinda what i pictured it.
